name: gabe-csv-text
description: Benchmark site for testing baseline plaintext perf when they are generated in a single csv file
author: Peter van der Zee <pvdz@github>

scripts.bench: rm -rf generated_articles; gatsby clean; N=${N:-512} node gen.js; CI=1 node --max_old_space_size=${M:-2}000 node_modules/.bin/gatsby build
